UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Identification of antimicrobial peptide regions derived from genomic sequences of phage lysins.
Literature.Author: Rotem S, Radzishevsky I, Inouye RT, Samore M, Mor A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>150µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=>150µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=>150µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>150µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>150µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>150µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=>150µM),Escherichia coli O157(MIC=>150µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. arizonae ATCC 13314(MIC=>150µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>150µM),Leishmania donovani(LC=>50µM)
